name: Greek Academic Network OCW / OER Consortium
display_name: Greek Academic Network OCW / OER Consortium
description: The non-profit civil company called "ACADEMIC NETWORK" (GUnet) was founded in September 12th 2000. GUnet has its central office in Athens and its members are all the Higher Education and Academic Institutions (20 Universities and 16 TEI). The aims of the company are determined by the broadband network needs and objectives of the Greek academic community in the framework of Information Society aiming at servicing research and education.
